analyzed: de las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //

original: kha dog ni yi ge h'um bzhin du bya ste /
analyzed: kha dog ni yi ge h'um bzhin du bya ste /

original: 'od zer gyis nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang sdig pa bshad pa dang ji srid du btang snyoms kyi bar du'o //

original: de'i rjes thogs la h'um dang rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams mtha' dag lus kyi nang du bstims la spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zla ba dad rdo rje dang sa bon dang 'od zer te /

analyzed: aom aa: bya ba 'di spros pa des legs par drangs la bcom ldan 'das gzhug par bya ba'o //

original: legs par bcug pa'i rjes la skad cig gis zla ba la sogs pa las legs par grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das tshon bor bdag nyid de lo lnga lon pa'i gzhon nu'i rnam pa bongs thung ba /

analyzed: khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa phyag g-yas pas thugs kar bsnams pa la zhal mngon du @20b phyogs nas gzigs pa /

analyzed: nang che ba'i rna ba ma phug pa zla ba tshes ba lta bu'i zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /

analyzed: spyan gnyis dmar zhing zlum ba khro gnyer dang ldan pa dpral bar thod leb mas bcings pa'i dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'phyur ba /

analyzed: dung skyong ser pos lag gdub tu byas pa dud mdog / kar bur dang rigs ldan gyi dbu rgyan du byas pa /

original: kha dog mthing nag la phyi rol gyi nye 'khor cung zad ser ba'i 'od zer ser po'i tshogs rnams spro bar byed par bsgoms la /

translated: After that, when the wind from the nostrils goes out, one should imagine that the light rays of the o·πÉ and so forth and the light rays of the vajra and h≈´·πÉ at the heart radiate out to the directions, and that all sentient beings who are made into the form of the Bhagavat by merely touching the light rays,

analyzed: yang rlung phyir rgyu ba na ni klu la sogs pa rnams kyis med pa'i rin po che rnams mdun gyi g-yon du bsgom par bya'o /
